TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlServices extends System.Object
public ref class SqlServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 支持安装和移除 ASP.NET 功能的 SQL Server 数据库元素。

span.span: Supports installing and removing the SQL Server database elements of ASP.NET features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 SQL Server 数据库来存储 ASP.NET 会话状态、 成员资格、 Web 部件个性化设置和角色管理等功能的信息。You can use SQL Server databases to store information for ASP.NET features such as session state, membership, Web parts personalization, and role management. 这些功能需要使用之前进行正确配置了连接到 SQL Server 数据库。These features require that the SQL Server database to which they are connected be properly configured before use. 可以使用 ASP.NET 注册 SQL 工具 (aspnet_regsql.exe) 来执行此操作，也可以调用公开的静态方法类直接从你的代码。You can use the ASP.NET Register SQL tool (aspnet_regsql.exe) to do this, or you can call the static methods exposed by the class directly from your code. > [!NOTE] > 使用 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具或类以配置该数据库仅设置的提供程序将使用具有适当的表、 触发器和存储的过程的数据库。Using the aspnet_regsql.exe tool or the class to configure the database only sets up the database that the providers will use with the proper tables, triggers, and stored procedures. 在这种方式中配置数据库不会修改配置文件以指定这些功能为这些服务使用 SQL 提供程序。Configuring the database in this way does not modify configuration files to specify that these features use the SQL Providers for these services. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/CS/usingsqlservices.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/VB/usingsqlservices.vb#1)]

related.span: 安装 SQL Server 提供程序数据库

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database

related.span: 会话状态模式

span.span: Session State Modes

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GenerateApplicationServicesScripts (bool install, System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures features, string database);
.method public static hidebysig string GenerateApplicationServicesScripts(bool install, valuetype System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures features, string database) cil managed
Public Shared Function GenerateApplicationServicesScripts (install As Boolean, features As SqlFeatures, database As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ GenerateApplicationServicesScripts(bool install, System::Web::Management::SqlFeatures features, System::String ^ database);
static member GenerateApplicationServicesScripts : bool * System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures * string -> string

param.name: install
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成安装指定功能的脚本；如果为 ，则生成移除功能的脚本。

span.span: to generate a script that installs the specified features; to generate a script that removes the features.

param.name: features
param.span: 值的按位组合，指定要为其生成脚本的特定功能。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values, specifying the specific features for which to generate scripts.

param.name: database
param.span: 生成的脚本中使用的 SQL Server 数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the SQL Server database to use in the generated scripts.

summary.span: 为选定功能生成 SQL 脚本。

span.span: Generates the SQL scripts for the selected features.

summary.span: 脚本将引用由数据库参数指示的数据库。

span.span: The scripts will reference the database indicated by the database parameter.
Returns the generated script code.

related.span: 安装 SQL Server 提供程序数据库

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database

param.name: install
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成安装指定功能的脚本；如果为 ，则生成移除功能的脚本。

span.span: to generate a script that installs the specified features; to generate a script that removes the features.

param.name: type
param.span: 值之一，指定为其生成脚本的会话状态的类型。

span.span: One of the values, specifying the type of session state for which to generate scripts.

param.name: customDatabase
param.span: 生成的脚本中使用的 SQL Server 数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the SQL Server database to use in the generated scripts.

summary.span: 生成用于安装或移除会话状态的 SQL 脚本。

span.span: Generates the SQL script for installing or removing session state.

summary.span: 脚本将引用由数据库参数指示的数据库。

span.span: The script will reference the database indicated by the database parameter.
Returns the generated script code.

span.span: The type is and the value is not supplied, or the type is either or and the value is not null.

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 数据库上安装选定 ASP.NET 功能的组件。

span.span: Installs components for selected ASP.NET features on a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`database`是`null`或未提供将使用默认数据库， `aspnetdb`。If `database` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default database, `aspnetdb`. 如果`server`是`null`或未提供，将使用默认 SQL Server 实例。If `server` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default SQL Server instance. > [!NOTE] > 使用可信连接建立到数据库服务器连接。The connection to the database server is made with a trusted connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的类。The following code example shows how to use the method of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/CS/usingsqlservices.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/VB/usingsqlservices.vb#4)]

exception.span: 无法连接到指定的数据库服务器。

span.span: Unable to connect to the specified database server.

exception.span: 值包含一个或多个无效标志。

span.span: The value contains one or more invalid flags.

exception.span: 处理操作所需的 SQL 语句时出现异常。

span.span: An exception occurred while processing the SQL statements required for the operation.

span.span: An exception occurred while processing the SQL statements required for the operation, an attempt was made to uninstall from a nonexistent database, or one or more tables for the features in the specified database contained data.

param.span: 连接字符串仅用来建立到数据库服务器的连接。

span.span: The connection string is only used to establish a connection to the database server.

param.span: 在连接字符串中指定数据库没有效果。

span.span: Specifying a database in the connection string has no effect.

summary.span: 从 SQL Server 数据库中移除选定 ASP.NET 功能的组件。

span.span: Removes components for selected ASP.NET features from a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`database`是`null`或未提供将使用默认数据库`aspnetdb`。If `database` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default database `aspnetdb`. > [!NOTE] > 使用可信连接建立到数据库服务器连接。The connection to the database server is made with a trusted connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的类型。The following code example shows how to use the method of the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/CS/usingsqlservices.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/VB/usingsqlservices.vb#3)]

exception.span: 无法连接到指定的数据库服务器。

span.span: Unable to connect to the specified database server.

exception.span: 值包含一个或多个无效标志。

span.span: The value contained one or more invalid flags.

exception.span: 处理操作所需的 SQL 语句时出现异常，尝试从不存在的数据库中卸载，或者指定数据库中功能的一个或多个表包含数据。

span.span: An exception occurred while processing the SQL statements required for the operation, an attempt was made to uninstall from a nonexistent database, or one or more tables for the features in the specified database contained data.

related.span: 安装 SQL Server 提供程序数据库

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database
